content:
IFrontEndAdapter IFrontEndAdapter Interface

In this Article

Edit

Defines operations that the DataLakeTransferClient needs from the FrontEnd in order to operate

Syntax

Declaration

public interface IFrontEndAdapterPublic Interface IFrontEndAdapter

Methods summary

AppendToStream(String, Byte[], Int64, Int32)
AppendToStream(String, Byte(), Int64, Int32)

Appends the given byte array to the end of a given stream.
Concatenate(String, String[], Boolean)
Concatenate(String, String(), Boolean)

Concatenates the given input streams (in order) into the given target stream. At the end of this operation, input streams will be deleted.
CreateStream(String, Boolean, Byte[], Int32)
CreateStream(String, Boolean, Byte(), Int32)

Creates a new, empty stream at the given path.
DeleteStream(String, Boolean, Boolean)
DeleteStream(String, Boolean, Boolean)

Deletes an existing stream at the given path.
GetStreamLength(String, Boolean)
GetStreamLength(String, Boolean)

Gets a value indicating the length of a stream, in bytes.
IsDirectory(String)
IsDirectory(String)

Determines if the stream with given path on the server is a directory or a terminating file. This is used exclusively for download.
ListDirectory(String, Boolean)
ListDirectory(String, Boolean)

Lists the Data Lake Store directory specified.
ReadStream(String, Int64, Int64, Boolean)
ReadStream(String, Int64, Int64, Boolean)

Opens a stream for reading given the speficied stream path
StreamExists(String, Boolean)
StreamExists(String, Boolean)

Determines if the stream with given path exists.

Methods

  • Edit
    AppendToStream(String, Byte[], Int64, Int32)
    AppendToStream(String, Byte(), Int64, Int32)

    Appends the given byte array to the end of a given stream.

    void AppendToStream(string streamPath, byte[] data, long offset, int length)Sub AppendToStream(streamPath As String, data As Byte(), offset As Long, length As Integer)

    Parameters

    • streamPath
      String
      String

      The relative path to the stream.

    • data
      Byte[]
      Byte()

      An array of bytes to be appended to the stream.

    • offset
      Int64
      Int64

      The offset at which to append to the stream.

    • length
      Int32
      Int32

      The number of bytes to append (starting at 0).

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException
      ArgumentNullException

      If the data to be appended is null or empty.

  • Edit
    Concatenate(String, String[], Boolean)
    Concatenate(String, String(), Boolean)

    Concatenates the given input streams (in order) into the given target stream. At the end of this operation, input streams will be deleted.

    void Concatenate(string targetStreamPath, string[] inputStreamPaths, bool isDownload = false)Sub Concatenate(targetStreamPath As String, inputStreamPaths As String(), isDownload As Boolean = False)

    Parameters

    • targetStreamPath
      String
      String

      The relative path to the target stream.

    • inputStreamPaths
      String[]
      String()

      An ordered array of paths to the input streams.

    • isDownload
      Boolean
      Boolean

      if set to true [is download], meaning we will concatenate the streams on the local machine instead of on the server.

  • Edit
    CreateStream(String, Boolean, Byte[], Int32)
    CreateStream(String, Boolean, Byte(), Int32)

    Creates a new, empty stream at the given path.

    void CreateStream(string streamPath, bool overwrite, byte[] data, int byteCount)Sub CreateStream(streamPath As String, overwrite As Boolean, data As Byte(), byteCount As Integer)

    Parameters

    • streamPath
      String
      String

      The relative path to the stream.

    • overwrite
      Boolean
      Boolean

      Whether to overwrite an existing stream.

    • data
      Byte[]
      Byte()

      The data.

    • byteCount
      Int32
      Int32

      The byte count.

  • Edit
    DeleteStream(String, Boolean, Boolean)
    DeleteStream(String, Boolean, Boolean)

    Deletes an existing stream at the given path.

    void DeleteStream(string streamPath, bool recurse = false, bool isDownload = false)Sub DeleteStream(streamPath As String, recurse As Boolean = False, isDownload As Boolean = False)

    Parameters

    • streamPath
      String
      String

      The relative path to the stream.

    • recurse
      Boolean
      Boolean

      if set to true [recurse]. This is used for folder streams only.

    • isDownload
      Boolean
      Boolean

      if set to true [is download], meaning we will delete a stream on the local machine instead of on the server.

  • Edit
    GetStreamLength(String, Boolean)
    GetStreamLength(String, Boolean)

    Gets a value indicating the length of a stream, in bytes.

    long GetStreamLength(string streamPath, bool isDownload = false)Function GetStreamLength(streamPath As String, isDownload As Boolean = False) As Long

    Parameters

    • streamPath
      String
      String

      The relative path to the stream.

    • isDownload
      Boolean
      Boolean

      if set to true [is download], meaning we will get the stream length on the local machine instead of on the server.

    Returns

    • Int64
      Int64

      The length of the stream, in bytes.

  • Edit
    IsDirectory(String)
    IsDirectory(String)

    Determines if the stream with given path on the server is a directory or a terminating file. This is used exclusively for download.

    bool IsDirectory(string streamPath)Function IsDirectory(streamPath As String) As Boolean

    Parameters

    • streamPath
      String
      String

      The relative path to the stream.

    Returns

    • Boolean
      Boolean

      True if the stream is a directory, false otherwise.

  • Edit
    ListDirectory(String, Boolean)
    ListDirectory(String, Boolean)

    Lists the Data Lake Store directory specified.

    IDictionary<string, long> ListDirectory(string directoryPath, bool recursive)Function ListDirectory(directoryPath As String, recursive As Boolean) As IDictionary(Of String, Long)

    Parameters

    • directoryPath
      String
      String

      The directory path.

    • recursive
      Boolean
      Boolean

      if set to true [recursive].

    Returns

    • IDictionary<String, Int64>
      IDictionary(Of String, Int64)

      The list of string paths and their corresponding file sizes, in bytes.

  • Edit
    ReadStream(String, Int64, Int64, Boolean)
    ReadStream(String, Int64, Int64, Boolean)

    Opens a stream for reading given the speficied stream path

    Stream ReadStream(string streamPath, long offset, long length, bool isDownload = false)Function ReadStream(streamPath As String, offset As Long, length As Long, isDownload As Boolean = False) As Stream

    Parameters

    • streamPath
      String
      String

      The relative path to the stream.

    • offset
      Int64
      Int64

      The offset at which to append to the stream.

    • length
      Int64
      Int64

      The number of bytes to append (starting at 0).

    • isDownload
      Boolean
      Boolean

      if set to true [is download], meaning we will open a stream on the server to read from, instead of the local machine.

    Returns

    • Stream
      Stream

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException
      ArgumentNullException

      If the data to be appended is null or empty.

  • Edit
    StreamExists(String, Boolean)
    StreamExists(String, Boolean)

    Determines if the stream with given path exists.

    bool StreamExists(string streamPath, bool isDownload = false)Function StreamExists(streamPath As String, isDownload As Boolean = False) As Boolean

    Parameters

    • streamPath
      String
      String

      The relative path to the stream.

    • isDownload
      Boolean
      Boolean

      if set to true [is download], meaning we will test if the stream exists on the local machine instead of on the server.

    Returns

    • Boolean
      Boolean

      True if the stream exists, false otherwise.
